trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Asheboro
There were no other sightings in Asheboro on or around January 4th 2008
divs: Sighting DetailsDriving home from work on Hwy 42 at 7:45 pm and saw a rectangle shape in the sky to my left and it was pulsating and the best I could tell it was not moving.It was just hanging there.I always look at the stars on a clear night ,but tonight there was something in the sky that I had never seen before ,It was a little bit rounded on the edges with lights going dim and bright but never went out . I didn't know what it was but it was not and airplane.Does anybody know what it was ? Was there any military aircraft in the area at the time?Let me know if anyone else saw what I saw please.
